price: په هغه ورځ به شفاعت څه ګټه نه رسوي مګر چاته چې رحمٰن اجازه وركړې وي او خبره يې خوښه كړي.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَرَضِيَ لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin lā tanfaʿu al-shafāʿatu illā man adhina lahu al-raḥmānu waraḍiya lahu qawlan
